data.message: DEAR FACEBOOK Greatest social network in the world ...i have a suggestion to you  because there's got many many many many Fake account on Facebook ..i hope you could limit them and control them ...mybe one email only for one user or mybe when open account or update account must have a face  recognition ...please take note..if you don't understand my English I'm sorry..my english is malayglish please try to translate yourself..
